mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gongji (num, memberId, isGongji, subject, content, created) VALUES (#{num}, #{memberId}, 1, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE gongji SET isGongji=#{isGongji}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, imageFilename=#{imageFilename} WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM gongji g JOIN member1 m ON g.memberId=m.memberId
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM gongji g JOIN member1 m ON g.memberId=m.memberId
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gongjiFile(fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES (gongjiFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize FROM gongjiFile WHERE num=#{num}
SELECT fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize FROM gongjiFile WHERE fileNum=#{fileNum}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM gongji g JOIN member1 m ON g.memberId=m.memberId
